snippet: Gu Kailai, who is married to the deposed leader Bo Xilai, is accused of poisoning a British businessman.
abstract: Murder trial of Gu Kailai, wife of deposed Chinese political leader Bo Xilai who is accused of poisoning British businessman Neil Heywood, is set to begin Anhui Province, China; scheduling of trial suggests that Communist Party officials are seeking to handle a messy political scandal before new leaders take charge.
lead_paragraph: Gu Kailai, who is married to the deposed leader Bo Xilai, is accused of poisoning a British businessman.

headline.seo: Murder Trial of Bo Xilai’s Wife to Begin Next Week
headline.main: Murder Trial of Disgraced Chinese Official’s Wife to Begin
headline.print_headline: Murder Trial of Disgraced Chinese Official’s Wife to Begin
